title: General
stimulusHtml:
Student response can earn up to 3 of the following available points:

1 point: munus = golden bough, fetus, “branch, fruit” but not “apple”

1 point: Use = to gain entrance to Underworld

2 points: Needs to refer to Underworld; prefer entry into the Underworld, but by implication

the bough also gets him out.

Answer must refer to why Aeneas needs the gift, or how it will help him. For example, student might say it helped him to see his father after Anchises’ death. If student mentions Proserpina, he or she must also mention why she wants/needs the gift.
